link.description: The Shadow Wallet is a secure, upgradeable on-chain wallet that supports receiving and transferring ERC20, ERC721, and ERC1155 tokens. It provides a seamless user experience with access control for deployers and owners, ensuring a smooth handover of wallet management. Designed with future extensibility in mind, the Shadow Wallet offers a scalable solution for developers and product owners in the ever-evolving blockchain ecosystem.
